dc:title: Winter Arrives, Work in House And Trip to West
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Hard winter conditions in New York has them working to stay warm. Takes a trip through the Middle West visiting houses of hospitality and describes their work. Applauds the Grail for a philosophy of labor.
